FTC 命令通用汽车停止收集和出售驾驶员数据https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/legal/ftc-orders-gm-to-stop-collecting-and- sell-drivers-data/ Sat, 18 Jan 2025 11:17:28 -0500比尔·图拉斯Legalhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/legal/ftc-orders-gm-to-stop-collecting-and- sell-drivers-data/ The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) has announced action against General Motors (GM) and its subsidiary, OnStar, for unlawful collection and sale of drivers' precise geolocation and driving behavior data without first obtaining their consent. FTC 严厉打击 Genshin Impact 扭蛋战利品箱行为https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/gaming/ftc-cracks-down-on-genshin-impact-gacha-loot-box-practices/ Fri, 17 Jan 2025 17:18:55 -0500劳伦斯·艾布拉姆斯GamingGovernment https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/gaming/ftc-cracks-down-on-genshin-impact-gacha-loot-box-practices/ Genshin Impact developer Cognosphere (aka Hoyoverse) has agreed to a $20 million settlement with the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC) over its gacha loot box monetization and is now banned from selling them to teens under the age of sixteen without parental consent. 针对 TikTok 和 Temu 向中国发送用户数据而提出的 GDPR 投诉https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/gdpr-complaints-filed-against-tiktok-temu-for-sending-user-data-to-china/ Thu, 16 Jan 2025 17:34:08 -0500比尔·图拉斯SecurityLegal https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/gdpr-complaints-filed-against-tiktok-temu-for-sending-user-data-to-china/ Non-profit privacy advocacy group "None of Your Business" (noyb) has filed six complaints against TikTok, AliExpress, SHEIN, Temu, WeChat, and Xiaomi, for unlawfully transferring European user's data to China and infringing European Union's general data protection regulation (GDPR).
